welcome_title: Decode the message of the stars.
welcome_subtitle: Your personal AI oracle analyzes unique aspects of your personality, talents, and life path based on your exact birth time
hero_badge: Using Swiss Ephemeris — the most accurate calculations
features_title: Unlock the secrets of your natal chart
feature_1_desc: Get personalized interpretations based on your unique data, not generic phrases from magazines.
feature_2_desc: Keep a record of events and track how the movement of the planets affects your life in real time.
feature_3_desc: An interactive graphic chart will show you all aspects of your personality in a beautiful and clear way.
step_1_desc: Provide your exact date, time, and place of birth for maximum calculation accuracy.
step_1_detail_1: Exact date and time of birth
step_2_desc: Our algorithms will instantly build your unique natal chart based on Swiss Ephemeris.
step_3_desc: Our AI oracle will analyze your chart and provide deep, personalized interpretations.
preview_subtitle: Simple and clear chart creation process
testimonial_1_text: Never thought astrology could be so accurate! The AI analysis revealed aspects of my personality I didn't even know about.
testimonial_2_text: Using it for six months now. Daily forecasts really help plan important decisions. The accuracy is amazing!
testimonial_3_text: The best astrological app I've ever used. The chart visualization is simply incredible!
trust_secure_desc: Your personal data is under reliable protection
trust_certified_desc: Using Swiss Ephemeris — the world standard
demo_subtitle: Interactive example of a natal chart with full AI analysis
demo_sun_content: You are a creative, intuitive personality with a deep emotional world. Your empathy and ability to understand others make you a natural healer.
demo_moon_content: Your emotional nature needs recognition and applause. You generously share your feelings with those around you.
demo_rising_content: You appear as an optimistic, adventure-open personality. Others perceive you as a wise teacher and traveler.
demo_week_forecast: Favorable time for creative projects. Venus trine to your Sun brings harmony to relationships.
demo_month_forecast: Mars in your 10th house activates career opportunities. Time for important professional decisions.
demo_cta_text: Want to get your own detailed chart with personal forecasts?
pricing_subtitle: From free introduction to professional astrological consulting
plan_premium_desc: Full access to all AI astrologer features
pricing_faq_1_a: Yes, you can change your plan anytime. When upgrading, you pay the difference.
pricing_faq_2_a: Yes, all paid plans have a 7-day free trial period.
pricing_faq_3_a: With yearly billing, you save 20% and get 2 months free.
pricing_faq_4_a: Yes, you can cancel your subscription anytime without additional fees.
money_back_desc: 30 days to return money with no questions asked
secure_payment_desc: Protected by SSL and PCI DSS certificates
final_cta_title: Your unique natal chart awaits you
final_cta_subtitle: Join thousands of people who have already discovered the secrets of their personality with our AI astrologer

faq_items.q: How accurate are your astrological calculations?
faq_items.a: We use Swiss Ephemeris — the most accurate astronomical data recognized by professional astrologers worldwide. Accuracy is our top priority.

faq_items.q: How are AI interpretations better than regular ones?
faq_items.a: Unlike generic horoscopes, our AI creates a unique interpretation based on all of your chart's data: the positions of planets, houses, and the aspects between them. This is a deeply personalized analysis.
Yes. We take privacy seriously. Your data is used exclusively for calculations within the app and is never shared with third parties.
